titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to make a grant to the State of Connecticut for alteration of a certain building for support of a State veterans' home and hospital.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 3/12/2002--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to make a grant to the State of Connecticut for the alteration of an existing facility for use as a recreational facility at the State veterans' home and hospital in Rocky Hill, Connecticut.
